鵽字的基本解释

鵽
duò
〔鵽鸠（
ji?）〕毛腿沙鸡。

鵽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《廣韻》丁括切，入末，端。］
［《廣韻》丁滑切，入黠，端。］
［《廣韻》丁刮切，入鎋，端。］
(1)鵽鸠。
(2)指青鵽。传说中的忘母之鸟。

鵽字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵽； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1493第05
【廣韻】丁括切【集韻】都括切，?音掇。鵽鳩，鳥名。【爾雅·釋鳥】鵽鳩?雉。【郭註】鵽大如鴿，似雌雉，䑕脚，無後指，岐尾，爲鳥憨急，羣飛，出北方沙漠地。【疏】又謂之泆泆，卽所謂?雉泆泆也。【禽經】奪曰鵽。【註】如鸇而小，取鳥雀如攘奪也。【異物考】蕃雀卽鵽也。【玉篇】鵽，一名冠雀。【本草】又名突厥雈。【張協·七命】晨鳧露鵠，霜鵽黃雀。又【廣韻】丁滑切【集韻】張滑切，?音窡。又【廣韻】丁刮切【集韻】張刮切，?音錣。又【集韻】徒活切，音奪。義?同。

考證：〔【郭註】鵽大如鴿，似雌雄。〕　謹照原文雌雄改雌雉。
鵽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鵽字的起名意思

暂无。

鵽
Basic explanation of words
鵽
duò
〔Jiao Dove (
ji?)] Hairy leg sand grouse.
鵽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Guangyun" Ding Kuo cut, enter the end, end. ]
["Guangyun" Ding sliding cut, into the corner, end. ]
["Guangyun" Ding cut, enter and end. ]
(1) Dove.
(2) Refers to the green dragonfly. The legendary bird of forgetting mother.
鵽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵽; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1493 05
[Guangyun] Ding Kuoqie [Jiyun] are all including Qie,? Yin 掇. Dove, the name of the bird. [Erya·Shiniao] Dove? Pheasant. [Guo's Note] It is as big as a dove, like a female pheasant, with feet, no back fingers, and divergent tails. It is anxious for birds and flies out of the northern desert. [Sparse] It is also known as the faint, the so-called? Pheasant 泆泆 also. [Qin Jing] Duo said 鵽. [Note] As small as a swan, fetching a bird is like a grabbing. [Foreign body test] Fan bird 鍽鵽 also. [Jade articles] 鵽, a crested bird. 【Materia Medica】also known as Turkic 雈. 【Zhang Xie·Seven Lives】Morning Dew, Frostbird Oriole. Also [Guang Yun] Ding Huaqie【Jiyun】Zhang Huaqie, sound mule. Also [Guang Yun] Ding Kuaqie [Jiyun] Zhang Kuaqie,? Sound. Also [Jiyun] lively and lively. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Guo's Note] 鵽 is as big as a dove, like a male and female. 〕 　 I would like to change the male and female pheasants according to the original text.
